comments:
Descritpion:
Bind a report scalar parameter to dataset parameter, when click "OK" button in the "Edit dataset" dialog, BIRT exception will throw out.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Create a report scalar parameter, decimal type with the default value 103.
2.create a sample datasource and dataset with "Select * from customers where CLASSICMODELS.CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMERNUMBER=?".
2.In the parameter tab, bind the input parameter with the report scalar parameter.Preview results in the dialog, result is correct. Then click "OK". BIRT exception throws out.

Error:
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: A BIRT exception occurred: Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: ReferenceError: "params" is not defined.
 Script source: ParamBinding(a), line: 0, text:
params["NewParameter1"]. See next exception for more information.
Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: ReferenceError: "params" is not defined.
